Articles.Content:
This is a challenge I am doing on my Dark Multiplayer serve and will be streaming the series on my Twitch Channel.

Premeis: There is a scary thing coming for the solar system and the kerbals must evauacte. The Kerbal Goverment has tasked 50 Kerbals to make it to another planet as similar to Kerbin as possible in another Solar System. The Kerbals have no current technology but do have contracts from other companies to help them along there path. Also there is a baseline Government funding campaign to save the Kerbal race. No new Kerbals can come onto this project due to it being top secret and there must be atleast 30 Kerbals transported to the new colony to get things going.

This will be played by 2-5 BrownCoats or fellow Kerbal Rocketry Volunteers.

For thoes who wish to watch the stream will be on Thursdays at 8:30 CT (Start Date TBD)

For thoes who wish to join hit me up in the comments

There is a mod list and a custom tech tree. I am currently creating zip and file that is drag and drop for ease of use. (Hours of tree building and bug testing)

Current Mod List:

Feature Mods:

  • Kerbal Attachment System
  • Remote Tech
  • Kerbal Universe 2
  • TAC Life Support
  • Deadly Reentry
  • ScanSat
  • RasterPropMonitor
  • DarkMultiPlayer
  • Kethane
  • [h=2]TAC Fuel Balancer v2.4.1[/h]
  • Davon Throttle Control systems
  • Simple Part Organizer
  • KSP-AVC Add-on Version Checker
  • Kerbal Engineer Redux
  • Kerbal Alarm Clock

  • Chatter
  • Docking Port Alignment Indicator
  • FinePrint
  • RasterPropMonitor
  • ScanSat

Part Packs:

  • KSP Interstellar
  • ESLD Jump Beacons
  • Umbra Space Industries (Every Mod)
  • B9 AeroSpace
  • Asteroid Recycling Technologies
  • [h=2]Extraplanetary Launchpads v4.4.0[/h]
  • LazTech SpaceX Historic Archive HD
  • LazTech SpaceX Launch Pack HD
  • LazTech SpaceX Eploration Expansion HD
  • KW Rocketry
  • LackLusterLabs
  • MechJeb2
  • BDArmory
  • Procedural Fairings
  • Station Science
  • DeepFreeze
  • Magic Smoke Industries Infernal Robotics
    Mods in Testing to add to Server:

  • L-Tech Scientific Industries

  • Kerbin Shuttle Orbiter System
  • Cold Rockets

  • Ion Hybrid Electric Pack
  • TiberDyne Space Shuttle Aerospace R&D Division
  • Space Shuttle Enginees
  • OPT Spaceplane Parts
  • KDEX Kerbal Dust Experiment
  • Mk.2 Lightning cockpit
  • DMagic Orbital Science
  • Davon Supply Mod
  • RealChute
  • EVA Parachutes
  • Caelum Ire Technologies Mods
  • Addon Controller
  • Part Catalog
  • Transfer Window Planner
  • NovaPunch 2.07

I love ksp very much and especially if its modded, i wouldn't play essentially cause its twitch or anything, but i would be willing to play for the fun of it. It'd be interesting to play DMP anyways, so if you are looking for a guy (who has a mic), then i can volunteer. By the way, if you like this following idea, perhaps i could be the force working against you, to destroy your stuff or outcompete you. Just an idea.

Edit: If you think ill be a good choice or just will let me join, IM me.

Edited November 23, 2014 by halander1
